description: This drink is perfect for Valentine's Day or anytime you feel romantic because it has so many aphrodisiacs. Rose petals and pomegranate juice make a stunning combination, while sake-based liqueur adds an extra touch of class to the cocktail!
name: Blushing Rose

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the Ty Ku, pomegranate juice, and rose nectar in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the Ty Ku, pomegranate juice, and rose nectar in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into stemmed glasses or over ice in old-fashioned glasses.
